channel.title: [FIXED] whats going on with this? [FIXED]
channel.description:
added bandos scimitar to server.
it's correct.
i went to add stats in item.cfg
here's what i put [code]item = 13400 Bandos_Scimitar It's_a_Bandos_Scimitar 30000000 30000000 30000000 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30[/code]
and when save, compile and restart server, it doesnt show up on item stats page..
any ideas?

item.title: [FIXED] whats going on with this? [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

added bandos scimitar to server.

it’s correct.

i went to add stats in item.cfg

here’s what i put

item = 13400	Bandos_Scimitar		It's_a_Bandos_Scimitar	30000000	30000000	30000000	30	30	30	30	30	30	30	30	30	30	30	30

and when save, compile and restart server, it doesnt show up on item stats page…

any ideas?
